metadata.name: Whoami.EXE Execution From Privileged Process
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" by privileged accounts that are often abused by threat actors

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('trustedinstaller'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" by privileged accounts that are often abused by threat actors
